derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English lād 'way, course', variant of load. The term denoted a watercourse in late Middle English and a lodestone in the early 16th cent. The current sense dates from the early 17th cent

means.word_mean: 1. a deposit of valuable ore occurring within definite boundaries separating it from surrounding rocks
